Hipster.

While hipsters are often stereotyped as being financially irresponsible and prioritizing lifestyle over financial stability, their affinity for vintage and second-hand items, as well as their DIY ethos, could actually work in their favor when it comes to avoiding loan repayment. By thrift shopping and repurposing materials, hipsters may be able to find creative ways to avoid paying off their loans. Additionally, their social media savviness and ability to curate a unique and Instagrammable lifestyle could help them gain support and sympathy from their peers, making it easier to avoid loan repayment.
